featured.text: The Assamese variety can grow 18 meters high and lives about 40 years.
Three main varieties of tea—Chinese, Assamese, and Cambodian—have distinct characteristics.

definition.zh_def: 阿薩姆語，印度阿薩姆邦的主要語言，屬於印度-雅利安語系。
definition.en_def: Assamese is the main language spoken in the state of Assam, India, belonging to the Indo-Aryan language family.
definition.example: She learned Assamese to communicate better with her friends from Assam.
